entry.title: where I put it
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 0.99 â†’ å…è²» ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put itâ€! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

entry.title: Notes Writer Pro 2025
entry.summary: Notes Writer Pro AI Assistant: USDÂ 3.99 â†’ USDÂ 1.99
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Notes Writer Pro AI Assistantï¼šUSDÂ 3.99 â†’ USDÂ 1.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

You have lecture notes to take, a story to tell, article to publish, whether itâ€™s todayâ€™s journal entry, tomorrowâ€™s thesis, highlight important things in ebooks and PDFs, fill out a PDF form or get the most from your business meetings. Notes Writer is an excellent assistant in study and business, also being effective for writing down your ideas and thoughts and sharing them! Students, teachers, writers, doctors, journalists, scholars and business professionals use Notes Writer daily to store notes, annotations, memos, signed PDFs, papers, highlighted PDF text-books, lectures and more. With Notes Writer Pro you can: + WRITE. EDIT. FORMAT Â· Write Everywhere: Use Notes Writer as an stand-alone writing app even if you donâ€™t have a computer or you are offline in the wilds Â· Create rich text format (RTF) and advanced Markdown (MD) documents Â· Define margins, headers/footers, paper sizes, MLA and APA style format Â· Live counters: characters, words, sentences, lines, Avg. Word length, Words per sentence & reading time Â· Text to Speech for proofreading Â· Dictation lets you speak text instead of typing Â· Typewriter: Distraction-Free mode, letting you focus on what youâ€™re writing Â· Over 30 languages typing support including Japanese, Chinese, Arabic & Hebrew Â· Extra keys: tab, forward delete, cursor up/down/left/right, etc. + ANNOTATE PDFs. FILL FORMS. SIGN DOCUMENTS. Â· PDF Annotations: highlight, strikeout, underline, notes, voice notes, pencil, stamp, sign... Â· Fill out forms. Supports PDF AcroForms standard Â· Sign with your own signature documents, contracts, forms Â· Digital Signature Validation + ORGANIZE. STRUCTURE. FIND. Â· Organize your work in unlimited notebooks, folders and subfolders Â· Create notebooks and projects in your own tree-like structure: Sections, Classes, Lectures, Grades, Drafts, Folders, Chapters, Research, etc. Â· Design the cover of your notebooks Â· Full-text search your library of documents and projects + SCAN NOTES. RESEARCH. PDF LIBRARY Â· Split view: Open two PDFs or handwritten notes simultaneously on screen. Compare or use them as book and paper Â· Full PDF reader and manager included for reference files, text books, ebooks, articles, resources, papers, etc. Â· Use the camera of your iPad/iPhone to scan documents, notes, recipes, tickets, etc. as PDF Â· Open PowerPoint, Word and Excel files + SHARE NOTES. EXPORT PDF, HTMLâ€¦ Â· Open attachments directly from the Mail app Â· Sync via iCloud, Dropbox, Box, WebDAV and Google Drive Â· Convert to multiple formats RTF, Markdown, PDF, ePub, HTML, RTFD, TXT, etc. Â· Zip folders/notebooks and email them + AUTOMATIC BACKUPS. BE SAFE. PROTECT YOUR WORK Â· Protect your work with an app security passcode Â· Protect any folder or project with a passcode Â· Automatic Backups of your notes and notebooks Notes Writer is more than an innovative, fast and reliable note-taking, PDF annotator and writing app designed for anyone who take notes or writes. This is a smart notepad and writing workspace for your iPad and iPhone. Privacy Policy http://www.noteswriter.com/Kairoos_Privacy_Policy.html EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
